sections.title: Features
sections.subtitle: Calmulate is designed to help you achieve a healthier work-life harmony.

sections.title: Seamless Calendar Synchronization
sections.description: Calmulate effortlessly integrates with your existing calendar, aligning your appointments and tasks with intelligent scheduling. It not only streamlines your day for peak productivity but also carves out time for rest, ensuring a balanced rhythm between work and wellness.

sections.title: Smart Wearable Connectivity
sections.description: Sync with your favorite wearables and let Calmulate bring a new level of personalization to your day. By tracking real-time stress and activity data, the app provides tailored insights to keep your well-being at the forefront of your daily routine.

sections.title: Mindfulness at Your Fingertips
sections.description: Delve into mindfulness with Calmulate's guided sessions and reminders, all thoughtfully woven into your day. With actionable analytics and serene prompts, the app not only helps you stay productive but also deeply connected to your moment-to-moment well-being.

sections.title: Common Questions
sections.subtitle: Learn more about Calmulate and our mission.

faqs.question: How does Calmulate help manage stress?
faqs.answer: Calmulate uses data from your calendar and wearables to suggest optimal work times and stress-relief activities.

faqs.question: Can I use Calmulate with my existing calendar?
faqs.answer: Yes, Calmulate is designed to integrate with most calendar applications seamlessly.

faqs.question: What makes Calmulate different from other productivity tools?
faqs.answer: Unlike other tools, Calmulate emphasizes mindfulness and well-being as core components of productivity.
